description:
Fix gouges and scrapes with this complete ski and snowboard base repair kit. It contains everything you'll need plus instructions.

  • Includes detailed DIY instructions
  • 3 pieces of combi fibertex/scotchbrite pads: Maroon, medium, Grey, fine and White, extra fine to use in progression to remove micro-hairs and surface oxidation
  • 5-pieces of structure premium sand paper, used to scuff damaged areas prior to Ptex application and to re-establish linear base structure pattern after Ptex repair
  • 6 Black and 6 Clear Ptex candles (8mm x 20cm) Black for black bases and Clear for white or colored bases
  • Stainless steel scraper, use as a drip plate for Ptex and to gently plane excess Ptex from base
name: Tools4Boards PTEX Base Repair Kit
